channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Red crosses painted on highway markings., 22nd August
item.description:
Red paint has been painted on the white road markings at the roundabout. Junction of Alma Road and Caernarvon Road. GL51.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 86, Caernarvon Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stile has been removed, and fences nailed across path, 22nd August
item.description:
On the Gloucestershire Way, first stile if walking footpath directly opposite entrance to Oxenton village. Can also be approached from Claydon.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oxenton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Builders depositing and leaving waste, 22nd August
item.description:
Builders at adjacent property leaving waste on public land. The road is Wellington Lane, Cheltenham

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Square, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: In wrong location, 22nd August
item.description:
The sign advising traffic that the A40 in Charlton Kings is closing for 4 months is too far down the A40 and needs to be before the traffic lights (Northleach - Cheltenham direction) as the diversion is going to take traffic down the Cirencester Road - therefore turning off at the Frogmill traffic lights. By the time the sign is seen, you have missed the turning!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 22nd August
item.description:
Customer reporting 4 dead deer in this location in the last few weeks - they have requested some signage to indicate deer in the area. They are going to speak to NH about the rest of the A40.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: Outside 138A, 22nd August
item.description:
The car has been parked outside my house on grass verge for a number of days and has not moved it is full of garden rubbish, it is obstructing view when trying to pull out of driveway on to main road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kerb protrudes as pavement is eroded - tripping hazard, 22nd August
item.description:
Outside No 59. See wideshot, problem is between the blue marks on the wideshot photo. This is adjacent to a similar problem already reported and marked with white paint. This may have been msised when reported before due to cars being parked over the area in question.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Rosehill Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Tree replacement, 22nd August
item.description:
The tree on the roundabout came down in the storms last winter. The main body has been removed. A section of trust has been left on the roundabout and a new tree is required. Can you please organise for the tree to be replaced.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Jersey Avenue, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree replacement required, 22nd August
item.description:
A tree was removed from outside No 5 Jersey Avenue due to storm damage/ disease a while ago. A replacement tree needs to be planted.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Jersey Avenue, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard on traffic island not working, 22nd August
item.description:
Along with none of the street lights not working the traffic island is not illuminated which is dangerous as a car is going to hit it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
